item.title: [PI] ::Spec
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

[quote=“extinct2255, post:1, topic:377329”]I want them to be only be able to use the ::spec command once every 2 minutes and not be able to use in wilderness.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("spec") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("gannon") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("agsprod")) { c.specAmount = 10.0; }[/quote]
So really, you want US to make the code for you.

Read full topic
